luy: Okhoya omanye sindu silala khu bulwale bwa Korona
swh: Kuna jambo MOJA tu unalopaswa kuelewa juu ya jinsi virusi vya Korona
eng: There's only ONE thing you need to understand about how a coronavirus

luy: Bulwale buno bukenda khubirira luasimulo lwo
swh: Virusi hivi vinasambaa wakati vitone hivi vya mate
eng: The virus spreads when these droplets

luy: Ima asinao. Noli chimita chibili khukhwama khumundu oli ne bulwale liasimulo se lilakhwolakho ta
swh: Kwenda mbali. Ukiwa umbali wa mita 2 hutafikiwa na vitone vikubwa vya mate.
eng: Keep your distance.﻿ ﻿2m will keep you safe ﻿from large droplets.

luy: Ne obona omundu okholola, namwe oasimula mala alwala okhoyela
swh: Kwa hivyo, unapoona mtu akikohoa/kwenda chafya/mgonjwa unaweza kuamua:
eng: So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:

luy: Baelesia emaski nyo nebaasimula bandu babandi bakhanyola bulwale buno ta
swh: Wape barakoa. Waweze kukoholea au kuendea chafya na kuwakinga wote walio karibu
eng: Give them a mask.﻿ ﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby

luy: Bandu banyala barumikhila emaski/sitambaa mumoni nyo belinde balekhe khunyola bulwale
swh: Pengine yeye si mgonjwa, anajikinga tu
eng: Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself

luy: Bandu bali ne bulwale buno banyala bafwana oli bakhali balwale ta, mala khabaambisia bandu babandi
swh: Watu wenye virusi huenda wasionyeshe ishara zozote, lakini bado wanaweza kuvisambaza
eng: People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are stillinfectious

luy: Okhacha mubandu bakali ta, sikila somanya nanu omulwale ta
swh: Kwa jumla, ni wazo bora kuepuka umati wa watu, maana huwezi kujua kama kuna mtu mgonjwa.
eng: And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick.

luy: Niye bandu batila nyo elifti enine namwe yiikhe
Ata enje we chimaski/bitambaa bye khwiboa mumoni
swh: & hata nje ya barakoa ya usoni mwako
eng: & even on the outside of your face mask

luy: Mumasee kakandi, kamare ko omulwale kanyala katila bindu bikali nga
swh: Isitoshe, huenda mate ya mtu mgonjwa yakawa kwenye vitu vingine …
eng: However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…

luy: Notilile bibindu bino nokhamanyile ta, mala witile mumoni namwe
swh: Ukigusa mojawapo wa vitu hivi kwa bahati mbaya, kisha ujiguse uso,
eng: And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,

luy: Engila enyala birusi bino ebechanga khubisinga nende esabuni namwe nende jik namwe kamalwa
swh: na njia ya kipekee iliyo bora kuviondoa ni kuviosha kwa sabuni, dawa ya klorini, au kileo.
eng: and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol.

luy: Birusi binyala byekhala mubindu muda kumuleyi sana
swh: Virusi vinaweza kukaa saa kadhaa juu ya vifaa,
eng: Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects

luy: Sikila eli bulayi khulonda bindu bino nio wilinde
swh: Kwa sababu hii ni vizuri pia kuyafuata maelekezo haya
eng: Which is why it is also good to follow these

luy: Singa nende esabuni paka wole mukhumbo
Okhatila mumoni mwowo namwe mwo mundu okundi ta. Nokhoyela otile, singa kamakhono nende esabuni bulayi.
swh: Usijiguse uso. (Au uuguse uso wa mtu mwingine yeyote.) Iwapo ni lazima ujiguse, kwanza ioshe mikono yako kabisa kwa sabuni.
eng: Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first.

luy: Ne wenya omanye oli wasingile kamakhono bulayi onyala wemba lulwimbo lwa mwanawamberi chisafari chitaru
swh: Muda sawa na wa kuimba kifungu cha “Wimbo wa Taifa” ﻿https://youtu.be/a37RnI3krzU
eng: Enough time to sing ﻿"Happy Birthday" twice
wash the back of your hands

luy: Notilile okharenga ta, singa busa kamakhono kowo.
swh: Iwapo umefanya hivyo, usihofu. Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni hapo baadaye.
eng: If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after.

luy: Okhatila enje we emaski/sitambaa sye mumoni tawe
swh: Pia, usiguse upande wa nje wa barakoa iwapo utaweza.
eng: Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.

luy: Buchafu bunyala bwakhurerera bulwale norumikhila bitambaa bye mumoni khu siise siileyi
swh: *Vijidudu vinavyosababisha magonjwa hukulia ndani ya barakoa unapozivaa kwa muda mrefu
eng: *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long

luy: Mwata chimaski/bitambaa bye mumoni. Okhafwara wabira endalo endala ta
swh: Zitupe barakoa zinapoanza kuwa nzito. Usizivae kwa zaidi ya siku moja!
eng: Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!

swh: Kila mtu awe na taulo yake

luy: Mukharumikhila byakhulia, chisaani, bikombe namwe chitaulo chindala tawe
swh: Usitumie kwa pamoja vitu kama chakula,vyombo vya jikoni,vikombe,taulo.
eng: Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.

luy: Se onyala wa tila mumoni nende ekhukunyu ta, wakhakhaka
swh: Huwezi kuugusa uso wako kwa kisugudi hata ukijaribu
eng: You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried

luy: No onyala, fungula namwe ikala kimilyango nende chikhumbo namwe kamabeka
swh: Fungua na funga milango kwa kutumia kisugudi au bega badala ya mikono, inapowezekana.
eng: Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.
and after being out in the public

swh: Kila wakati nawa mikono yako ukitumia sabuni …
eng: Always wash your hands with soap…

luy: Newenya khumanya kamakali chilila khusoma niko baandike angaki ano
eng: Read the articles for more tips!

luy: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
swh: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, ﻿in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)
eng: "This animation shows how far your sneeze can actually travel" by Chia Yi Hou and Andrea Schmitz, in Business Insider (Jan 21, 2020)

swh: Hoja za ziada: Maelekezo haya ya kiafya ya vibonzo yanafaa sana katika kuzuia maambukizi ya kawaida kama mafua na homa, na yanafaa kuzingatiwa daima, hata wakati hakuna mkurupuko wa magonjwa. Marejeo: Habari iliyo katika kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo imejikita kwa uelewa wa ugonjwa wa COVID19 kufikia tarehe 28 Februari 2020, na imetolewa kwa marejeo hii tatu. ﻿https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10 Habari za ziada: Unaweza kupata toleo la PDF la kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kutoka kwa tovuti hii: https://gumroad.com/weimankowart  Maelekezo ya Kutumia: Kijitabu hiki cha vibonzo kiko huru kwa matumizi ya umma kupitia kwa tovuti na mitandao ya kijamiii kama vile Whatsapp na Telegram. Vile vile, nakala zinazotolewa kutoka kwa tovuti zinaweza kuchapishwa bure kama vibango vya matumizi ya kibinafsi na kielimu nyumbani, shuleni, na mahali pa kazi.   Wakati unapowapa wengine kijitabu hiki, tafadhali kumbuka hoja hizi 3: ﻿1) Hakuna ruhusa kuhariri chochote kwa njia yoyote unapokisambaza. ﻿2) Vibonzo hivi haviwezi kutumiwa kwa mradi wowote wa kuleta faida. ﻿3) lwapo unakisambaza kupitia kwa tovuti, weka jina la mwandalizi wa kitabu katika FB kwa kuweka @weimankowart, kwa IG kwa kuweka @weimankow (IG), au hata kuandika linki kwa instagram com/weimankow Kwa matumizi mengineyo yote, tafadhali tuma ombi kwa: comicsforgood@gmail.com
eng: Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic.  References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10 Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: ﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart  Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces.  When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. ﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project ﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com

swh: Virusi vya Ugonjwa wa Korona    Kuna jambo MOJA tu unalopaswa kuelewa juu ya jinsi virusi vya Korona VINAVYOSAMBAA Mdomoni Puani Machoni Vinapokuingia Mtu mwenye Afya Mgonjwa wa Korona Virusi hivi vinasambaa wakati vitone hivi vya mate Kwenda mbali. Ukiwa umbali wa mita 2 hutafikiwa na vitone vikubwa vya mate.      1 Mita 2 Achoo! Kwa hivyo, unapoona mtu akikohoa/kwenda chafya/mgonjwa unaweza kuamua:  Wape barakoa. Waweze kukoholea au kuendea chafya na kuwakinga wote walio karibu 2 Vitone vya *kamasi* AU, Pengine yeye si mgonjwa, anajikinga tu Watu wenye virusi huenda wasionyeshe ishara zozote, lakini bado wanaweza kuvisambaza Kwa jumla, ni wazo bora kuepuka umati wa watu, maana huwezi kujua kama kuna mtu mgonjwa. Vijiti vya kulia  Mtu mwenye afya Vishikilio vya gari Vitufe vya lifti  Tishu  Vikombe  Vifaa vya kidijitali  & hata nje ya barakoa ya usoni mwako  Kingo za ngazi Kipanya  Kalamu Vitasa vya mlango  Mikononi mwao  Isitoshe, huenda mate ya mtu mgonjwa yakawa kwenye vitu vingine …  nyote mnaweza kuugua.   au umguse mwenzako uso    ujisugue macho  Ukigusa mojawapo wa vitu hivi kwa bahati mbaya, kisha ujiguse uso,  na njia ya kipekee iliyo bora kuviondoa ni kuviosha kwa sabuni, dawa ya klorini, au kileo.   Virusi vinaweza kukaa saa kadhaa juu ya vifaa, Sabuni  Kwa sababu hii ni vizuri pia kuyafuata maelekezo haya Oga kwa ﻿sabuni hadi hapa  Sabuni  Kisugudi Usijiguse uso. (Au uuguse uso wa mtu mwingine yeyote.) Iwapo ni lazima ujiguse, kwanza ioshe mikono yako kabisa kwa sabuni. Muda sawa na wa kuimba kifungu cha “Wimbo wa Taifa” ﻿https://youtu.be/a37RnI3krzU  chini ya kucha   kwa ﻿sekunde 20  katikati mwa vidole  nawa nyuma ya mikono yako  Nini maana ya kuoga kabisa? Iwapo umefanya hivyo, usihofu. Nawa mikono yako kwa sabuni hapo baadaye. Pia, usiguse upande wa nje wa barakoa iwapo utaweza.  vitone vya mate *Vijidudu vinavyosababisha magonjwa hukulia ndani ya barakoa unapozivaa kwa muda mrefu Zitupe barakoa zinapoanza kuwa nzito. Usizivae kwa zaidi ya siku moja!  Tumia kijiko cha kupakulia  Mtoto Baba Mama Kila mtu awe na taulo yake  Usitumie kwa pamoja vitu kama chakula,vyombo vya jikoni,vikombe,taulo. Huwezi kuugusa uso wako kwa kisugudi hata ukijaribu Fungua na funga milango kwa kutumia kisugudi au bega badala ya mikono, inapowezekana. Nyumbani na unaporudi kutoka kwa umma  Kabla hujala  Kila wakati nawa mikono yako ukitumia sabuni … Hatimaye,  Sabuni Kaeni salama,  Nyote!  Kaeni salama,  Nyote!  Sabuni Soma makala hii ujue zaidi! eng: About Coronavirus    There's only ONE thing you need to understand about how a coronavirus SPREADS Mouth Nose Eyes Get into your  Healthy Person Sick person The virus spreads when these droplets  Keep your distance.﻿ ﻿2m will keep you safe ﻿from large droplets. 1 2m Achoo! So if you see someone who is visibly coughing/sneezing/sick you can choose to:  Give them a mask.﻿ ﻿They can cough or sneeze in it and protects everyone else nearby 2 Thank you ﻿*sniffles* OR, Maybe she's not sick, just protecting herself People who are infected can show no symptoms, but are stillinfectious And in general, it's a good idea to avoid crowds, because you don't know who might be sick. Chopsticks  Healthy person   Train straps  Lift buttons   Tissues  Cups Digital devices & even on the outside of your face mask Stair bannisters   Mouse  Pens Door knobs Their hands  However, sometimes a sick person's saliva can get on other things…  you might all fall sick or your loved one’s face  rub eyes  And if you do touch any of these things by accident, and then touch your face,  and the only effective way to get rid of them is to wash them off with soap, bleach, or alcohol. Viruses can last for quite a few hours on objects  Soap precautions Which is why it is also good to follow these wash with ﻿soap up to here soap elbow Do not touch your face. (Or anyone else's face.) If you have to, wash your hands with soap thoroughly first. Enough time to sing ﻿"Happy Birthday" twice  under the nails  for 20 seconds   between the fingers   wash the back of your hands  What is thoroughly?  If you did, don't worry. Just wash your hands with soap after. Also, don't touch the outside of the mask if you can.  droplets *Bacteria grows on the insides of your mask if you wear them too long  Throw away masks once they feel gross. Don't wear them for more than a day!  Use a serving spoon  Baby Daddy Mommy Everyone gets their own towel  Do not share food, utensils, cups, towels.  You can't touch your face with your elbow even if you tried Open & close doors with your elbows or shoulders instead of hands, if possible.  Home  and after being out in the public   Before you eat Always wash your hands with soap…  And finally, Soap Stay safe, everyone!  Stay safe, everyone! Soap Read the articles for more tips! (Jan 28, 2020) Main references for medical info:  Additional notes: Hygiene precautions in comic are effective in preventing many other common infections such as flu and cold, and should be applied in every day life, even when there is no epidemic.  References: lnformation in comic is based on understanding of COVID19 up till 28 Feb 2020, and mainly from these three references. https://www.nytimes.com/2020/01/28/opinion/coronavirus-prevention-tips.html﻿https://foreignpolicy.com/2020/01/25/wuhan-coronavirus-safety-china/  ﻿https://www.businessinsider.com/how-far-sneeze-cough-germs-can-travel-2018-10 Additonal lnformation A PDF version of the comic is available for free download here: ﻿https://gumroad.com/weimankowart  Sharing Guidelines This comic is free for the general public to share online and through Whatsapp and Telegram, and the downloads are free for printing out as posters for personal and educational use in homes, schools, and workplaces.  When sharing, please remember these 3 points: ﻿1) No edits to the comics is allowed in any way when sharing. ﻿2) Comics cannot be used for any commercial project ﻿3) lf online, credit the creator on FB by tagging @weimankowart, on IG by tagging @weimankow (IG), or providing a link to instagram com/weimankow﻿For all other uses, please send a request in to: comicsforgood@gmail.com About Coronavirus
